metadata.title: ImgNinja - Free Online Image Converter
metadata.description: Convert images to WebP, AVIF, PNG, JPEG formats instantly. Fast, free, and completely private - all processing happens in your browser. No uploads, no registration required.
metadata.keywords: image converter, webp converter, avif converter, png converter, jpeg converter, online image tool, free image converter, browser image processing, client-side image conversion, private image converter, no upload image converter, web image optimization, image format converter, ImgNinja

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect your data and images.
privacy.metaDescription: Comprehensive privacy policy explaining how Image Converter protects your data with client-side processing and no server uploads.
privacy.notice: Your images never leave your device. All processing happens locally in your browser. We don't store or transmit your files.

clientSide.title: Client-Side Processing
clientSide.guarantee: 100% Client-Side Processing - Your images never leave your device
clientSide.description: Our image converter operates entirely within your web browser using modern web technologies. This means your images are processed locally on your device and never uploaded to our servers or any third-party services.
clientSide.point1: All image conversion happens in your browser using Canvas API and Web Workers
clientSide.point2: No images are ever uploaded to servers or transmitted over the internet
clientSide.point3: Processing continues to work even when you're offline
clientSide.point4: Your images remain completely private and under your control

dataHandling.title: Data Handling and Storage
dataHandling.description: We are committed to transparency about how your data is handled during the conversion process.

browserStorage.title: Browser Storage Usage
browserStorage.description: Our application uses your browser's local storage mechanisms temporarily during the conversion process:
browserStorage.point1: Temporary storage of image data in browser memory during processing
browserStorage.point2: Use of Web Workers for background processing without blocking your browser
browserStorage.point3: Temporary creation of object URLs for download functionality
browserStorage.point4: All temporary data is automatically cleared when you close the browser tab

dataClearing.title: Clearing Your Data
dataClearing.description: You have complete control over clearing any temporary data stored by our application:

howTo.title: How to clear all local data:
howTo.step1: Close all browser tabs with our application
howTo.step2: Clear your browser's cache and local storage
howTo.step3: Use your browser's developer tools to inspect and clear storage
howTo.step4: Restart your browser for complete cleanup

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdParty.description: While we don't share your images with any third parties, our website does integrate with some external services for functionality and monetization:

googleAds.title: Google Ads
googleAds.description: We display advertisements through Google Ads to support our free service:
googleAds.point1: Google Ads may collect anonymous usage data for ad targeting
googleAds.point2: No image data or conversion history is shared with Google
googleAds.point3: You can use ad blockers to prevent ad-related data collection

analytics.title: Analytics (if applicable)
analytics.description: We may use analytics services to understand how our application is used:
analytics.point1: Only anonymous usage statistics are collected
analytics.point2: No personal information or image data is included in analytics
analytics.point3: Analytics help us improve the application's performance and features

technical.title: Technical Implementation
technical.description: Our privacy-first approach is built into the technical architecture of our application:

webWorkers.title: Web Workers
webWorkers.description: We use Web Workers to process images in background threads, ensuring your browser remains responsive while maintaining complete privacy.

canvasApi.title: Canvas API
canvasApi.description: Image conversion is performed using the HTML5 Canvas API, which operates entirely within your browser without any external communication.

fileApi.title: File API
fileApi.description: We use the browser's File API to read your selected images directly from your device without uploading them anywhere.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Control
userRights.description: Because all processing happens locally, you maintain complete control over your data:
userRights.point1: Right to complete privacy - your images never leave your device
userRights.point2: Right to data portability - download your converted images anytime
userRights.point3: Right to deletion - simply close your browser to clear all temporary data
userRights.point4: Right to transparency - our open approach to privacy and data handling

security.title: Security Measures
security.description: We implement several security measures to protect your privacy:
security.point1: Content Security Policy (CSP) headers to prevent malicious scripts
security.point2: HTTPS encryption for all website communications
security.point3: No server-side storage or logging of user data
security.point4: Regular security updates to our web application

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.info: For privacy-related inquiries, please use the contact information provided on our website.

hero.title: Transform Images Instantly
hero.subtitle: Professional image conversion with zero uploads. Fast, secure, and completely private - all processing happens in your browser.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device. All processing happens locally in your browser.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Instant conversion with Web Workers. No waiting, no delays, just results.

quality.title: Professional Quality
quality.description: Advanced algorithms ensure perfect results every time with customizable settings.

upload.title: Upload Your Images
upload.content: Drag and drop your images here or click to browse. We support all major formats including PNG, JPEG, WebP, AVIF, and more.

format.title: Choose Output Format
format.content: Select the format you want to convert to. We'll show you recommendations based on your image type and intended use.

quality.title: Adjust Quality Settings
quality.content: Fine-tune the quality and compression settings. Higher quality means larger file sizes, while lower quality reduces file size.

convert.title: Start Converting
convert.content: Click here to start the conversion process. All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device.

introduction.subtitle: Let us show you how to get the most out of our image converter

privacy.title: 100% Private Processing
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device. All conversion happens locally in your browser for complete privacy.

speed.title: Lightning Fast Conversion
speed.description: Powered by Web Workers for instant results. No waiting, no delays - just fast, efficient processing.

quality.title: Professional Quality
quality.description: Advanced algorithms ensure perfect results with customizable quality settings for every use case.

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.description: Convert multiple images at once with our intelligent queue system. Download individually or as a ZIP file.

boundary.title: Something went wrong
boundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.

codes.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: The selected file type is not supported. Please choose a valid image file (PNG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, SVG, WebP, AVIF).
codes.FILE_TOO_LARGE: The file is too large. Maximum file size is 50MB.
codes.INVALID_FILE: The selected file is invalid or corrupted. Please choose a different image.
codes.TOO_MANY_FILES: Too many files selected. You can upload a maximum of 10 files at once.
codes.CONVERSION_FAILED: Image conversion failed. Please try again or select a different format.
codes.CANVAS_ERROR: A browser canvas error occurred during conversion. Try refreshing the page.
codes.WORKER_ERROR: Background processing error. Conversion will continue without Web Worker support.
codes.MEMORY_ERROR: Not enough memory to process this image. Try a smaller file or close other browser tabs.
codes.TIMEOUT_ERROR: Conversion took too long and was cancelled. Try a smaller image or different format.
codes.UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: This format is not supported by your browser. Try a different output format.
codes.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your browser does not support the required features. Please update your browser or try a different one.
codes.FEATURE_NOT_AVAILABLE: This feature is not available in your browser. Some functionality may be limited.
codes.WEBWORKER_NOT_SUPPORTED: Web Workers are not supported. Conversion will run on the main thread and may be slower.
codes.FILE_READ_ERROR: Could not read the selected file. Please try selecting it again.
codes.FILE_CORRUPT: The selected file appears to be corrupted or damaged. Please try a different image.
codes.DOWNLOAD_ERROR: Failed to download the converted image. Please try again.
codes.NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
codes.QUOTA_EXCEEDED: Browser storage quota exceeded. Please clear some space or close other tabs.
codes.PERMISSION_DENIED: Permission denied. Please allow the required permissions and try again.
codes.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who trust ImgNinja for their image conversion needs
